channel.title: [Hybrid PVP] Fixing Hand Cannon?
channel.description:
Anyone have any idea how to fix hand cannon?.... i spawn hand cannon, hand cannon shots and it says "You cannot use hand cannon shots with hand cannon"
ALSO, on this post http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html i followed the tutorial however i'm having a problem with it;
My compile and run is different to the one in the post?
Run; [code]@echo off title InsideRS java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
Compile; [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]
Where would i put; .\AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar in both of them? I place AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar in Source HyBriD PvP
Any ideas PREFFERABLE ON THE PORTFORWARD
P.S. The reason why i can't portforward the proper way i cannot get onto the page when you type the ip on i have no idea what my user and pass is... I'VE TRIED EVERYTHING. (EXCEPT THE CORRECT ONE!) but is there any way of reseting it or something?

item.title: [Hybrid PVP] Fixing Hand Cannon?
item.dc:creator: @ShAuNyShAuN ShAuNyShAuN
item.description:
@ShAuNyShAuN wrote:

yo dude 1345:

to get your modem username and password you must first reset your modem/router. By reset i mean by pressing the tiny button on the sides or back of your modem/router. now wait till your internet pops back on. Ok now you must go to your router page and type in admin for the user and password for the password. If that doesn’t work please tell me what kind of modem/router you are currently using. Like netgear, linksy,s ect…

That didnt work… when i type my ip in it just says DSL router… thats all :S

Read full topic

item.title: [Hybrid PVP] Fixing Hand Cannon?
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

maybe do some coding (combat assistant)

Read full topic

item.title: [Hybrid PVP] Fixing Hand Cannon?
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

to get your modem username and password you must first reset your modem/router. By reset i mean by pressing the tiny button on the sides or back of your modem/router. now wait till your internet pops back on. Ok now you must go to your router page and type in admin for the user and password for the password. If that doesn’t work please tell me what kind of modem/router you are currently using. Like netgear, linksy,s ect…

Read full topic

item.title: [Hybrid PVP] Fixing Hand Cannon?
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“ShAuNyShAuN, post:1, topic:398486”]Anyone have any idea how to fix hand cannon?.. i spawn hand cannon, hand cannon shots and it says
“You cannot use hand cannon shots with hand cannon”

ALSO, on this post http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html
i followed the tutorial however i’m having a problem with it;

My compile and run is different to the one in the post?

Run;

@echo off title InsideRS java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Compile;

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

Where would i put; .\AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar in both of them?
I place AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar in Source HyBriD PvP

Any ideas PREFFERABLE ON THE PORTFORWARD

P.S. The reason why i can’t portforward the proper way i cannot get onto the page when you type the ip on i have no idea what my user and pass is… I’VE TRIED EVERYTHING. (EXCEPT THE CORRECT ONE!) but is there any way of reseting it or something?[/quote]
You can reset your username and password for your router to be able to log in and portfoward by calling your router company.

Read full topic
